section.p: The Vital Signs Section contains information documenting the patient vital signs.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Coded Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.2) (C83-[CT-119-1])

SHALL satisfy: Contains entries conforming to the Vital Sign module. (C83-[CT-119-2])
[OCL]: self.entry->exists(entry : cda::Entry | entry.organizer.oclIsKindOf(ihe::VitalSignsOrganizer) and entry.organizer.component.observation->exists(obs : cda::Observation | obs.oclIsKindOf(hitsp::VitalSign)))
SHALL conform to CCD Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.16)
SHALL conform to IHE Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.25)
SHALL conform to IHE Coded Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.2)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "8716-3" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC) (CONF-382, CONF-383)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains IHE Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) (6.3.3.4.5)

[CDA] SHALL satisfy: classCode
[OCL]: not self.classCode.oclIsUndefined() implies self.classCode=vocab::ActClass::DOCSECT

[CDA] SHALL satisfy: moodCode
[OCL]: not self.moodCode.oclIsUndefined() implies self.moodCode=vocab::ActMood::EVN
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: title Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'vital signs'. (CONF-385)

[HITSP] SHALL satisfy: Contains entries conforming to the Vital Sign module. (C83-[CT-119-2])
[OCL]: self.entry->exists(entry : cda::Entry | entry.organizer.oclIsKindOf(ihe::VitalSignsOrganizer) and entry.organizer.component.observation->exists(obs : cda::Observation | obs.oclIsKindOf(hitsp::VitalSign)))
